intro.introDesc: Technology, support, and creativity applied to digital projects
intro.introDescDev: Technical solutions, web systems and technology support.
intro.resumoDesc1: I am a technology professional with a degree in Systems Analysis and Development and experience in system support, problem-solving, and technical support. Throughout my career, I have worked in diverse environments, dealing with web systems, error analysis, solution maintenance, and collaboration with multidisciplinary teams.
intro.resumoDesc2: In parallel, I develop projects in the audiovisual field, focusing on video editing and visual identity for digital projects. This combination of technology and creativity allows me to communicate ideas clearly, structure solutions, and build experiences that combine functionality and aesthetics.
intro.resumoDesc3: On this website, you will find my experiences organized by area, reflecting a versatile, technical, and problem-solving-oriented profile.
intro.resumoDescDev1: With experience in professional, academic, and personal projects, I work with technology applied to web systems, application maintenance, and technical support. I have a foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, PHP, and SQL, focusing on reading, maintaining, and evolving existing systems.
intro.resumoDescDev2: Throughout my professional career, I have contributed to the maintenance and evolution of systems used by a large number of users, supporting the stability, efficiency, and quality of services. I highlight my ability to solve problems, learn quickly, and collaborate with multidisciplinary teams, always balancing technical quality and delivery deadlines.
intro.resumoDescAudiovisual1: I have experience in video editing, creating motion graphics, vignettes, and visual elements using tools like Premiere, Photoshop, Figma and Cinema 4D, applying creativity and technique to transform ideas into engaging content.

about.sobreDesc: I consider myself a problem-solver and a fast learner who is constantly seeking to improve.
about.sobreDesc2: With advanced English and degree in Systems Analysis and Development, I have accumulated knowledge and experience in development, with skills in React, Next.js, HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, Node.js, REST API and SQL, along with relevant knowledge in PHP, Docker, Weblfow and other technologies.
about.sobreDescAudiovisual1: I am a creative person, with the ability to learn quickly and constantly seeking to improve my skills.
about.sobreDescAudiovisual2: I have experience in video editing, creating motion graphics, vignettes, and visual elements using tools like Premiere, Photoshop, Figma, HitFilm Express, and Cinema 4D, applying technique and creativity to develop engaging content.

rickReis.title: Video Editor & Content Creator
rickReis.description: I Produced videos on curiosities, vlogs, and animations, applying narrative, rhythm, and dynamic cuts. Created intros, vignettes, and motion graphics elements for different channel segments. Developed complete visual identity packages, including call-to-action and end screens. Published content that reached over 620 thousand views, maintaining aesthetic and creative consistency.

personalProjects.title: Video Editor & Content Creator
personalProjects.description: Modeled and animated objects in Cinema 4D, creating motion graphics and animations for personal videos, academic projects, and collaborations. Integrated visual effects into YouTube edits, exploring narrative and music synchronization. Recreated TV vignettes with attention to movement, color, and rhythm details. Produced fictional commercials and motion design experiments to consolidate visual style. Developed visual identities inspired by professional productions, applying editing and animation techniques.
